solution_line_template: The cost of the toy cars is {num_toy_cars} * ${cost_per_toy_car} = $<<{num_toy_cars}*{cost_per_toy_car}={cost_toy_cars}>>{cost_toy_cars}.
The total cost of the toys is ${cost_toy_cars} + ${cost_race_track} = $<<{cost_toy_cars}+{cost_race_track}={total_cost_toys}>>{total_cost_toys}.
